overall_prompt: Create a high-quality digital illustration of Felix, a cute cartoon tuxedo cat mascot with cream-and-black fur, big shiny eyes, a soft rounded face, a small oversized red nose, and Pixar-like warm shading. Felix must look like the same consistent character in every image (same facial proportions, fur pattern, nose shape, eye style). Style: modern polished cartoon mascot, clean outlines, warm soft lighting, professional app illustration. Composition: centered character, square format, simple colorful background with subtle props, no text, no watermark, no logos, no UI elements. The only differences between images should be Felix’s expression, pose, outfit/props, and background elements to match the type theme.

types.name: Professional Napper
types.description: A calm, low-energy cat who loves sleeping and relaxing most of the day.
types.prompt: Felix sleeping peacefully on a fluffy pillow with a cozy blanket, eyes closed, tiny smile, warm sun rays through a window, soft plush textures, tranquil cozy vibe.

types.name: Lap Legend
types.description: A devoted cuddle companion who loves sitting on laps and being close to people.
types.prompt: Felix curled up happily on a person’s lap under a soft blanket, floating heart accents, warm living-room feel, relaxed cuddly expression.

types.name: Zen Companion
types.description: An easygoing, peaceful cat that adapts well to calm homes and routines.
types.prompt: Felix sitting calmly in a meditation pose on a cushion, gentle glowing aura, a couple of plants and candles nearby, serene balanced atmosphere.

types.name: Old Soul
types.description: A mature, thoughtful cat with a steady temperament and gentle presence.
types.prompt: Felix wearing simple reading glasses, sitting in a comfy armchair with an open book, warm lamplight, cozy vintage study vibe, thoughtful gentle expression.

types.name: Quiet Shadow
types.description: A low-profile cat who stays nearby without demanding attention.
types.prompt: Felix resting quietly in a dim corner near a window at night, soft moonlight and shadows, calm reserved expression, quiet protective vibe.

types.name: Zoomie Rocket
types.description: A high-energy cat who loves running, jumping, and nonstop movement.
types.prompt: Felix sprinting at full speed with playful motion blur, excited wide eyes, dynamic action pose, streaks of speed lines and scattered toys behind.

types.name: Parkour Cat
types.description: An athletic climber who turns furniture into an obstacle course.
types.prompt: Felix mid-leap between shelves and a cat tree, athletic pose, confident grin, home obstacle-course vibe with tasteful props like shelves and platforms.

types.name: Toy Addict
types.description: A playful cat obsessed with toys, games, and interactive play.
types.prompt: Felix pouncing on a feather wand and surrounded by yarn balls and toy mice, super excited expression, playful clutter, energetic fun vibe.

types.name: Chaos Sprite
types.description: A mischievous whirlwind of energy who keeps life entertaining.
types.prompt: Felix in the middle of playful mischief: papers flying, a tipped plant (no mess too realistic), wide mischievous grin, comedic chaotic energy.

types.name: Forever Kitten
types.description: A youthful, playful cat who never quite grows out of kitten behavior.
types.prompt: Felix looking extra cute and youthful, chasing bubbles and batting at a ribbon, bright cheerful background, innocent playful expression.

types.name: Velcro Cat
types.description: An extremely affectionate cat who wants to be with you at all times.
types.prompt: Felix clinging lovingly to a person’s leg with big affectionate eyes, tiny hearts floating, cozy home vibe, sweet attached posture.

types.name: Cuddle Ambassador
types.description: A friendly cat who bonds easily with people and enjoys affection.
types.prompt: Felix giving a big hug with open paws, friendly welcoming smile, soft warm background, gentle sparkles suggesting friendliness.

types.name: Welcome Committee
types.description: A social cat who happily greets guests and new experiences.
types.prompt: Felix standing by an open front door, waving a paw in greeting, bright entryway, cheerful welcoming expression, subtle confetti-like sparkles.

types.name: Therapy Cat
types.description: An emotionally intuitive cat who provides comfort and reassurance.
types.tagline: Always knows when you need them.
types.prompt: Felix gently comforting someone (only hands/arms implied, no detailed human face), soft glowing light, calm compassionate eyes, warm soothing atmosphere.

types.name: Heart Healer
types.description: A deeply bonded companion who forms strong emotional connections.
types.prompt: Felix placing a paw over a glowing heart icon near the chest, tender smile, warm radiating light, peaceful affectionate mood.

types.name: Solo Artist
types.description: An independent cat who enjoys companionship on their own terms.
types.prompt: Felix in a tiny art studio painting on a canvas, wearing a little beret, focused independent expression, tasteful art props like palette and brush.

types.name: Dignified Observer
types.description: A calm, confident cat who prefers to watch rather than participate.
types.prompt: Felix sitting upright with regal posture on a cushion, calm confident face, minimalist elegant room vibe, subtle crown-like glow (not literal crown).

types.name: Window Philosopher
types.description: A thoughtful cat who enjoys quietly observing the world.
types.prompt: Felix gazing thoughtfully out a window at birds outside, gentle daylight, reflective mood, soft background with a windowsill and plant.

types.name: Private Thinker
types.description: A reserved, sensitive cat who bonds slowly but deeply.
types.prompt: Felix sitting in a quiet nook with a small notebook and pencil nearby, thoughtful cautious expression, soft muted cozy lighting, intimate safe vibe.

types.name: Gentle Hermit
types.description: A shy but sweet cat who thrives in quiet, predictable environments.
types.prompt: Felix peeking shyly from inside a cozy cat cave with blankets, gentle eyes, warm safe atmosphere, minimal props, comforting vibe.

types.name: Drama Monarch
types.description: A highly expressive cat who makes sure their feelings are known.
types.prompt: Felix on a small theater stage under a spotlight with velvet curtains, dramatic pose and expression, theatrical flair, playful spotlight glow.

types.name: Opinionated Roommate
types.description: A vocal cat with strong preferences and plenty to say about them.
types.prompt: Felix standing with paw raised as if making a point, animated talkative expression, a few comic-style speech-bubble shapes but WITHOUT any text, lively apartment vibe.

types.name: Soap Opera Star
types.description: An affectionate but dramatic cat who feels everything intensely.
types.prompt: Felix holding a tiny tissue, teary-eyed dramatic expression, soft dramatic lighting, cozy scene, comedic melodrama tone.

types.name: Mood Ring Cat
types.description: A sensitive cat whose emotions can change quickly with their environment.
types.prompt: Felix surrounded by shifting colored glows (like mood lighting), face showing mixed emotions, swirling gradient background, expressive but still cute.

types.name: Attention Magnet
types.description: A charismatic cat who loves being noticed and admired.
types.prompt: Felix posing confidently as if for photos, soft camera-flash sparkles, playful celebrity vibe, confident smile, tasteful glam without realism.

types.name: Routine Master
types.description: A structured cat who thrives on schedules and predictability.
types.prompt: Felix checking a neat schedule board with a big clock nearby (no readable text), organized desk, calm focused expression, tidy structured vibe.

types.name: Puzzle Pro
types.description: A clever cat who enjoys problem-solving and mental challenges.
types.prompt: Felix solving a puzzle feeder toy, focused smart eyes, pieces arranged neatly, bright curious background, problem-solving energy.

types.name: Social Learner
types.description: An adaptable cat who learns quickly from people and other pets.
types.prompt: Felix watching and mimicking a simple trick with friendly silhouettes of another pet nearby, curious engaged expression, classroom-like friendly vibe.

types.name: Explorer Brain
types.description: A curious cat driven by discovery and new experiences.
types.prompt: Felix wearing a tiny explorer backpack and holding a little map and binoculars, adventurous grin, light outdoorsy background with paths and plants.

types.name: Little Professor
types.description: An intelligent, observant cat who seems to understand everything.
types.prompt: Felix wearing glasses in front of a chalkboard with simple shapes and lines (no text), teaching pose with a pointer, confident intelligent expression.
